translation.en: [priest] Lord, have mercy on us.
[congregation] Christ, have mercy on us.
[priest] Lord, have mercy on us. Christ, hear us.
translation.it: Signore, abbi pietà di noi. Cristo, ascoltaci.

translation.en: [congregation] Christ, graciously hear us.
[priest] God, the Father in heaven.
[congregation] Have mercy on us.
God, the Holy Ghost.
[congregation] Have mercy on us.
The Holy Trinity, one God.
[congregation] Have mercy on us.
Good night, Joe. Good night, Father.
Dennis, your minute steak's getting cold.
translation.it: Dennis, ti si è freddata la bistecca.

translation.en: Confession went late.
Agnes Samson thought about stealing her sister's watch.
translation.it: Agnes Samson aveva solo pensato di rubare un orologio.

translation.en: Took a good ten minutes to convince her that wasn't a sin.
translation.it: Ho dovuto convincerla che non è peccato.

translation.en: Well, Dennis, this is Father Adeyemi.
Visiting the archdiocese from Nigeria.
translation.it: È qui in visita dalla Nigeria.

translation.en: My pleasure. Welcome to California. Ah, thank you.
Eat up, McMurtry.
Miracle on 34th Street is playing at the Westmont.
Will you be joining us, Father McMurtry?
I'll stay in tonight, thanks.
It's been raining pretty hard, and I think I'm coming down with something.
translation.it: Piove e temo di essermi già raffreddato.

translation.en: [man] Suit yourself.
Hello, ladies.
[man] Hi.
Can I help you? Sorry to bother you.
My car broke down up the road, and it's getting cold out.
translation.it: Ho l'auto in panne e fa molto freddo.

translation.en: I hate to ask, but I wonder if I could use your phone?
translation.it: Odio chiederlo, ma posso usare il suo telefono?

translation.en: Oh, sure. Please, come in, dry off.
Thank you very much.
The… the telephone is in the parlor if you'd like to call the garage.
translation.it: Il telefono è in salotto, se vuole chiamare l'autorimessa.

translation.en: Can I make you a cup of coffee?
That'd be nice. Thanks.
[Dennis] Where are you coming from?
All over, I guess.
You're welcome to that, if you're hungry.
translation.it: Si serva pure, se ha fame.

translation.en: I'll eat it later.
Fantastic. Just fantastic, Monsignor.
That was magical.
I'm glad you enjoyed it.
[man] Oh, boy.
I'll put on some coffee, warm us up.
Thank you.
[man] That's probably a new experience.
[man] Yes. She is magnificent.
-Sleep well. -Thank you, Monsignor.
-Glad you enjoyed it. -Good night.
-Good night. -Thanks again, Monsignor.
What's going on?
No! No!
Hello, Monsignor.
Sister Margaret McGuire,
you remember her?
She was my mother.
You're my dad, Monsignor.
That's…
that's nonsense.
[breathing fast] All right, all right, I knew her.
W… we did things together, but she wanted it.
translation.it: Abbiamo fatto delle cose insieme, ma lei lo voleva.

translation.en: She ended up in a whore house.
One of them shot her up with morphine…
-[screams] Please forgive me! -…and it killed her.
translation.it: Qualcuno le iniettò morfina, uccidendola. Ti prego, perdonami!

translation.en: And I got sent to an orphanage.
Look, you've got to understand.
[voice wavering] I'm a sinner.
I've suffered for my sins.
translation.it: Ho sofferto per i miei peccati.

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no.
Now you're gonna suffer.
Here's that map you asked for, ma'am.
translation.it: La cartina che ha chiesto, signora.

translation.en: Thank you.
[man] May I ask why you're headed to Lucia?
translation.it: Posso chiederle perché va a Lucia?

translation.en: It seems like a rather personal question, now, doesn't it?
translation.it: È una domanda troppo personale, non trova?

translation.en: Sorry.
Clearly your tumescence has distracted you, sir.
translation.it: La sua tumescenza deve averla distratta.

translation.en: I recall asking for today's local paper.
translation.it: Le avevo chiesto il giornale di oggi.

translation.en: Oh! Sorry.
Here you go.
Yeah, it's big news around here.
Everybody's up in arms.
Fella cuts up a bunch of priests and they ship him up to Lucia?
translation.it: Ammazzi un gruppo di preti e ti internano a Lucia?

translation.en: Hey, that's where you're headed.
translation.it: Ehi, è lì che sta andando.

translation.en: You're not some sort of journalist or something, are you?
You should bathe more often.
Your fingernails are filthy.
[sighs] What do I owe the pleasure?
I have a reservation.
What's the name?
Vultures, all of them.
San Francisco Chronicle is offering $5,000
translation.it: Il San Francisco Chronicle offre 5.000 dollari

translation.en: to whoever gets the first shot of the Clergy Killer.
translation.it: a chi fotografa per primo il Killer del Clero.

translation.en: You're not a vulture, are you? No, ma'am.
translation.it: - Lei non è un avvoltoio? - No, signora.

translation.en: I'm a nurse.
Ice machine's at the end in the interior of the breezeway.
translation.it: La macchina del ghiaccio è in fondo al porticato.

translation.en: We provide that machine as a courtesy,
translation.it: Il motel ne offre l'uso gratuito ai suoi ospiti,

translation.en: so I wouldn't abuse that privilege if I were you.
translation.it: ma non abuserei del privilegio, se fossi in lei.

translation.en: I pay very close attention
to how much ice is in that machine at any given time.
translation.it: alla quantità di ghiaccio contenuta in quella macchina.

translation.en: [muttering] God damn it.
May I offer help with the key?
Not much to look at, but we've got a phone in the office.
translation.it: Non c'è molto da guardare, ma abbiamo un telefono in ufficio.

translation.en: Thank you.
And just so you know, if you happen to have any gentlemen callers,
translation.it: E sappia che, se riceverà visite galanti,

translation.en: I'm going to know about it.
And I do not run a house of ill repute.
translation.it: Questo non è un motel dalla dubbia reputazione.

translation.en: Do you understand me?
[Mildred] Hello, I'm here to speak with Dr. Hanover.
translation.it: Salve, sono qui per parlare con il dott. Hanover.

translation.en: It's a pleasure to meet you, sir.
Sir, it is a pleasure to meet you.
I have come quite a long way and would just like to speak with him.
translation.it: Ho fatto molta strada per venire qui. Vorrei solo parlargli.

translation.en: [man] Priest killer must die!
translation.it: Il Killer del Clero deve morire!

translation.en: I have an appointment. Thank you.
Can I help you?
Hello. I'm here to speak with Dr. Hanover.
translation.it: Sono qui per parlare col dott. Hanover.

translation.en: I'm sorry, darlin'. He's not talking to press right now.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, cara. Non parla con la stampa.

translation.en: Oh, I'm not the press. I'm the new night shift nurse.
translation.it: No, sono la nuova infermiera notturna.

translation.en: Dr. Hanover hasn't technically hired me yet,
translation.it: Il dottore non mi ha ancora assunta,

translation.en: but I'm supposed to have a formal interview with him at 11:00,
translation.it: ma ho un colloquio di lavoro con lui alle 11:00,

translation.en: as this letter clearly states.
[chuckles] Okay, one second. I'm just gonna go get a nurse.
Oh, I'm sorry.
You aren't a nurse?
Me? No.
I'm a nurse trainee.
I admire nurses more than anything.
They really are God's angels.
Yes. Yes, we are.
Okay, be right back.
[man] Hiya.
Have a nice day.
[woman] My preliminary recommendation is this:
translation.it: Le condizioni per me sono queste:

translation.en: that if Mr. Salvatore wants the board to seriously consider a furlough,
translation.it: se il sig. Salvatore vuole che la direzione consideri il congedo,

translation.en: he must continue with Dr. Hanover's regimen of colonics,
translation.it: dovrà continuare l'idrocolonterapia del dott. Hanover,

translation.en: he must attend group therapy three times daily,
translation.it: fare terapia di gruppo tre volte al giorno

translation.en: and he must take his saltpeter tablets as prescribed.
translation.it: e prendere pastiglie di salnitro come prescritto.

translation.en: Am I understood?
[girl] Nurse Bucket? You're needed at nurse's station one.
translation.it: Infermiera Bucket? È richiesta in accettazione.

translation.en: Excuse me.
There's a letter.
Where did you get this?
You must be the head nurse.
Mildred Ratched. I didn't ask what your name was.
translation.it: - Mildred Ratched. - Non ho chiesto il suo nome.

translation.en: Where did you get the letter?
Why, it was sent to me.
That's where I'm confused,
because there is no one in his office except for Dr. Hanover and myself.
translation.it: In direzione, ci siamo solo io e il dott. Hanover.

translation.en: I didn't send that.
translation.it: Non ho mandato io la lettera e le assicuro,

translation.en: And I can assure you, that isn't Dr. Hanover's signature.
translation.it: Non ho mandato io la lettera e le assicuro, quella non è la firma del dottore.

translation.en: I have come quite a long way and would just like to speak with him.
translation.it: Ho fatto molta strada. Vorrei solo parlargli.

translation.en: Dr. Hanover is out of the office till later this afternoon.
translation.it: Il dott. Hanover non rientrerà prima di oggi pomeriggio.

translation.en: If you'd like to leave a number--
If you don't mind, I'd prefer to wait here.
He'll be gone some time.
You just said he'd return in the afternoon.
It could be longer.
Well, then it could be shorter.
By your own logic.
I truly don't mind waiting.
I have nowhere else to be.
Very well.
-[door opens] -[woman] I'm sorry, Dr. Hanover.
The governor's going to have to reschedule.
Maybe next month.
Another?
No, thank you. Got a long journey back.
translation.it: No, grazie. Mi aspetta un lungo viaggio.

translation.en: …on second thought…
Good afternoon.
Good afternoon, Governor.
I have your booth in the back for you. Right this way.
[Dr. Hanover] Excuse me, Gov. Wilburn.
Dr. Richard Hanover.
-I know who you are. -We had a meeting scheduled today.
translation.it: - So chi è. - Doveva ricevermi oggi.

translation.en: You're the guy who runs the loony bin in Lucia.
translation.it: Lei dirige quel manicomio a Lucia.

translation.en: I prefer the term "psychiatric rehabilitation facility."
We had a similar meeting scheduled last month, and the month before that.
translation.it: Doveva ricevermi già il mese scorso e quello prima.

translation.en: Maybe we should hear him out.
Tell you what, I'll give you until the moment our drinks are delivered for you to give me your pitch.
translation.it: Le do tempo finché non ci servono da bere per dirmi cos'ha da dire.

translation.en: Excuse me, do you mind?
I didn't invite you to sit.
You see, Governor, I don't run a loony bin.
My hospital is a bastion of recovery and rehabilitation unlike any other.
translation.it: Il mio ospedale è un baluardo di recupero senza uguali.

translation.en: Now, as for the funding, I'm currently constructing a barn
translation.it: Circa le sovvenzioni, sto costruendo un fienile.

translation.en: to be used in various therapeutic regimens.
-And people are-- -And… time's up.
We can maybe meet again in a month or so, or…
translation.it: Possiamo incontrarci di nuovo tra un mese o...

translation.en: Thank you for your time, Governor.
Yeah.
Interesting.
[man] Looking good today, Miss Dolly.
[Dolly] Thanks, Harold.
[chuckles] Whatcha up to?
Just making my rounds.
Excuse me.
Where can I find your restroom?
Down the hall to the left.
Thank you.
You're welcome.
Looking good today, Mildred.
[Dr. Hanover] Is there something specific you needed, Nurse Bucket?
I'm afraid there's a woman here.
She says she has a job interview with you.
translation.it: Dice di avere un colloquio con lei.

translation.en: I didn't agree to any such thing.
Get rid of her, please.
I tried, she's very insistent.
translation.it: Ci ho provato. È molto insistente.

translation.en: I'll take care of it.
You. Are you the one who's here for the interview?
translation.it: Lei. È lei quella del colloquio?

translation.en: Yes, an interview that was supposed to start several hours ago.
translation.it: Sì, un colloquio che doveva iniziare ore fa.

translation.en: Forgive me, Dr. Hanover, I know your work is very important.
translation.it: So che il suo lavoro è importante,

translation.en: But I, too, value my time.
translation.it: ma lo è anche il mio tempo.

translation.en: But I suppose if you were willing to conduct the interview right now,
translation.it: Tuttavia, se condurrà subito il colloquio,

translation.en: I could try my best to look past the insult.
Your office is this way?
Uh, yeah. Right this way.
I apologize for the mix-up.
If I'm being honest, I don't recall consenting to any sort of an interview.
translation.it: Sarò sincero, non ricordo di averle accordato un colloquio.

translation.en: That's quite all right, Doctor.
With a nursing staff as unexceptional as the one you have,
translation.it: Con uno staff infermieristico carente come il suo,

translation.en: certain clerical errors are bound to happen.
translation.it: è normale incorrere in certi errori.

translation.en: Nurse Bucket, a moment, please.
translation.it: Infermiera Bucket, ci dia un momento.

translation.en: Please, take a seat.
[Mildred] I hope it's not inappropriate, Doctor, to confess something,
translation.it: Spero non sia inopportuno confessarle questa cosa,

translation.en: but I was a nurse in the Pacific theater during the war.
translation.it: ma ho fatto l'infermiera in guerra.

translation.en: Where exactly were you stationed?
I island-hopped with Admiral Nimitz's boys,
translation.it: Ho seguito le truppe dell'ammiraglio Nimitz,

translation.en: from Tarawa, to Saipan, to Okinawa.
translation.it: da Tarawa, a Saipan, a Okinawa.

translation.en: You'll see that's where I became familiar with administering anesthetics.
translation.it: Vedrà che è lì che ho imparato a somministrare anestetici.

translation.en: I'm well versed in all the blood derivatives,
oxygen therapy, and, of course, the treatment of shock.
Do you have scat throwers here?
translation.it: Ha dei lanciatori di feci qui?

translation.en: Patients who throw their feces?
translation.it: Pazienti che lanciano i loro escrementi?

translation.en: Oh, yes. In fact, we do.
Well, that won't faze me.
I've encountered many cases of soldiers with battle fatigue,
translation.it: Ho assistito molti soldati affetti da nevrosi da guerra.

translation.en: who lost their wits entirely.
Men who would try to rape a woman if they could get a hold of her,
translation.it: Uomini che provavano a stuprare qualunque donna

translation.en: and when they couldn't, would content themselves by throwing excrement…
ejaculate...
But I was not deterred, Doctor. In fact, I was invigorated…
translation.it: Ma non mi sono mai scoraggiata, semmai fortificata.

translation.en: because I was a member of the most unsung profession we have in this country.
translation.it: Perché svolgevo la professione più misconosciuta del Paese.

translation.en: We had a saying in the Corps,
"Save one life, and you're a hero."
translation.it: "Salva una vita e sei un eroe.

translation.en: "Save 100 lives…
[voice wavering] …well, then you're a nurse."
I must say you're a very impressive woman, Miss Ratched.
translation.it: Lei è una donna notevole, sig.na Ratched.

translation.en: And clearly passionate.
-But unfortunately-- -May I venture one last query, Doctor?
Do you believe the human mind can be cured?
translation.it: Lei crede che la mente umana si possa curare?

translation.en: I do.
But it's not about belief.
translation.it: Ma non si tratta di credere.

translation.en: It requires no act of faith.
I've seen it with my own eyes.
translation.it: L'ho visto con i miei occhi.

translation.en: I have not.
But I hope you'll believe me when I tell you
translation.it: Ma spero mi creda quando dico

translation.en: it is all I want in the world.
translation.it: che è tutto ciò che voglio al mondo.

translation.en: Miss Ratched, you're…
one of the more interesting women I've had the pleasure of meeting,
translation.it: è una donna dal profilo molto interessante,

translation.en: but I'm sad to say that until I can secure more funding from the state,
translation.it: ma finché lo Stato non mi concede ulteriori sovvenzioni,

translation.en: I simply don't have the resources to bring you on.
translation.it: non ho le risorse per assumerla.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
But when there is an opening, please trust that I will consider you.
translation.it: Ma se si libererà un posto, la terrò in considerazione.

translation.en: Well…
if there's one thing I've learned, Doctor…
translation.it: se ho imparato una cosa, dottore...

translation.en: it's that life can be quite unpredictable.
translation.it: è che la vita può essere imprevedibile.

translation.en: Thank you for your time.
[Nurse Bucket] The sheets were not ironed correctly, the bedpans were a disgrace,
translation.it: Le lenzuola erano stirate male, le padelle erano uno schifo

translation.en: and Amelia, too much smiling.
I mean, could we have less teeth and more work?
translation.it: Puoi mostrare meno denti e più impegno?

translation.en: Thank you all for your help.
And the towels, were they folded by the blind?
translation.it: E gli asciugamani, li ha piegati un cieco?

translation.en: [man] Come on.
Hello.
I'm looking for Amelia Emerson.
She's not home, and I'm about to head out on a sales call. Something I can help you with?
translation.it: Non è in casa e io sto andando al lavoro. Posso aiutarla?

translation.en: Oh, I'm just an old high school friend passing through town.
translation.it: Sono solo una vecchia compagna di liceo.

translation.en: Maybe you could give her a message?
What was your name?
Arlene. Arlene Bauer.
[man over radio] The question is, is this an attempt at avoiding the death penalty,
translation.it: Mi chiedo, è un tentativo di evitare la pena di morte,

translation.en: or is Edmund Tolleson really crazy?
translation.it: o Edmund Tolleson è davvero pazzo?

translation.en: He's being transported from San Quentin Prison for psychiatric evaluation.
translation.it: Lascerà il carcere per una valutazione psichiatrica.

translation.en: Law enforcement is keeping some of the details under wraps,
translation.it: La polizia ha segretato alcuni dettagli,

translation.en: but word is that one of the victims was almost beheaded.
translation.it: ma pare che una vittima sia stata quasi decapitata.

translation.en: [man 2] That concludes our special report on the Clergy Killer.
translation.it: Questi gli ultimi aggiornamenti sul Killer del Clero.

translation.en: -And now… -Do you think you could do me a favor?
This killer gives me the chills, and I'm not talking Bela Lugosi chills.
translation.it: Questo killer mi dà i brividi e non come i film con Bela Lugosi.

translation.en: Although, I'd sell my soul for a date with him.
translation.it: Anche se venderei l'anima per una cena con lui.

translation.en: I'd let him sink his teeth into me and suck me dry
translation.it: Gli lascerei azzannarmi e succhiarmi tutto il sangue,

translation.en: as if he really were Count Dracula.
If you could just do--
translation.it: - Se potesse... - Ho letto ogni articolo.

translation.en: I read all these papers, and none of them describe
translation.it: - Se potesse... - Ho letto ogni articolo. Non ce n'è uno che descriva

translation.en: what this Edmund fella actually did to those priests.
translation.it: cosa questo Edmund abbia fatto davvero a quei preti.

translation.en: Now, what favor can I do for you?
If anyone calls asking for Arlene Bauer, could you let me know?
translation.it: Mi avvisa se qualcuno chiama chiedendo di Arlene Bower?

translation.en: It's a little joke between me and an old friend.
translation.it: È un vecchio scherzo tra me e un'amica.

translation.en: And is Arlene Bauer paying for another night's room,
translation.it: E questa Arlene Bower pagherà la stanza per un'altra notte,

translation.en: or are you two splitting the bill?
translation.it: o dividete il conto in due?

translation.en: A smile like that could melt ice.
translation.it: Un sorriso così può sciogliere il ghiaccio.

translation.en: So I've been told.
Well, I don't like it.
A lady in my position could go so far as to say you're leering.
translation.it: Una signora come me potrebbe trovare i suoi modi lascivi.

translation.en: A gentleman in my position can't help it
translation.it: Un uomo come me non sa trattenersi,

translation.en: when he's staring at a beautiful woman like yourself.
translation.it: quando vede una bella donna come lei.

translation.en: No, I'm not married.
I've never done this before.
Do you think we could just sit?
Actually, can you sit on that corner?
So what do we do now?
Let's pretend we're husband and wife who've just had a fight.
translation.it: Fingiamo di essere marito e moglie che hanno litigato.

translation.en: What was the fight about?
Children.
You want them, but I don't.
I believe they're nothing but a burden,
translation.it: Per me, sono solo un fardello.

translation.en: but you believe a family isn't a family without them.
translation.it: Per te, una famiglia non può dirsi tale senza.

translation.en: What are you doing?
So when do we make up?
We don't. You leave.
translation.it: Non la facciamo. Tu te ne vai.

translation.en: Why would I leave?
Because…
you'll think you're right,
and I'll think I'm right.
Then we'll both realize it's not going to work.
translation.it: E capiremo entrambi che non può funzionare.

translation.en: And then we'll get a divorce.
Only to find soon after that I'm pregnant.
translation.it: Solo per scoprire poco dopo che sono incinta.

translation.en: And you will convince me to keep it.
translation.it: E tu mi convincerai a tenere la bambina.

translation.en: And then you'll die.
I'll raise it for a few years till I can't do it anymore,
translation.it: Io la crescerò per qualche anno, finché non ce la farò più,

translation.en: and then I will leave her on a doorstep.
translation.it: e poi la abbandonerò su un uscio.

translation.en: I'm sorry, I don't see what the problem is.
translation.it: Scusa, non vedo quale sia il problema.

translation.en: When you're ready, you know where to find me.
[groans] Is that all you got?
Arlene Bauer,
you have a phone call.
You should take your coat off.
It's warm in here.
Do you need a drink?
Walter is an excellent bartender.
Look, I don't know what you think you saw.
translation.it: Senti, non so cosa pensi di aver visto.

translation.en: Oh, I know what I saw.
What is it you want?
Your job.
And since there aren't any positions available,
I have been forced to create one myself.
translation.it: sono stata costretta a crearmene uno da sola.

translation.en: What makes you think my husband will believe you?
translation.it: Chi ti dice che mio marito ti crederà?

translation.en: And what am I supposed to tell him?
Tell him this town is poison…
translation.it: Digli che questa città è veleno...

translation.en: and that you want to get as far away from it as possible.
translation.it: e che vuoi allontanarti il più possibile.

translation.en: For your daughter.
[woman] How would you feel about your hospital
being the cornerstone of the governor's reelection campaign?
translation.it: il caposaldo della campagna di rielezione del governatore.

translation.en: What is there to say? I'm… [chuckles]
I'm speechless.
Your facility,
your bold new ideas,
translation.it: le sue idee audaci e innovative,

translation.en: their proven results,
this will force voters to see the governor in a whole new light.
translation.it: costringeranno gli elettori a vedere il governatore sotto una nuova luce.

translation.en: Not as a musty old bureaucrat, but as a forward-thinking progressive.
translation.it: Non come un burocrate stantio, ma come un lungimirante progressista.

translation.en: A leader who can rehabilitate a lost segment of the state workforce
translation.it: Un leader che può riabilitare un segmento perduto della forza lavoro,

translation.en: and move them back into the economy.
I believe this will swing momentum back to us…
translation.it: Sono convinta che questo darà un nuovo slancio a noi...

translation.en: and the governor into his reelection.
translation.it: e al governatore per la rielezione.

translation.en: So, Doctor.
What do you say?
[Nurse Bucket] I can't believe it, sir.
Our hospital. I mean, your hospital…
translation.it: Il nostro... Cioè, il suo ospedale

translation.en: …finally getting the recognition it deserves.
This is everything we've ever wanted.
We have work to do.
Nowhere do I want anything greater than a ten-to-one patient-to-staff ratio.
translation.it: Manteniamo un rapporto pazienti-infermieri di dieci a uno.

translation.en: -Is that clear? -That could be difficult, sir.
Why is that difficult, Nurse Bucket?
Well, sir, it's Amelia. She hasn't shown up yet.
translation.it: Beh, signore, Amelia non si è fatta viva oggi.

translation.en: What about Jackie?
She's on vacation in Monterey.
And who approved that? You, I imagine.
translation.it: E chi gliele ha approvate? Lei, immagino.

translation.en: Mm, Dr. Hanover, service came for you.
Phone call. A Dr. Richard Hanover.
This is a big day for all of us.
translation.it: È un grande giorno per tutti noi.

translation.en: Doctors, nurses, and low-level attendants.
It is imperative that we live up to the expectations
translation.it: Sarà essenziale essere all'altezza delle aspettative

translation.en: that attracted Gov. Wilburn's attention.
It is our moment to prove why this hospital is so special.
translation.it: Gli dimostreremo perché questo ospedale è così speciale.

translation.en: What are you doing here?
[Mildred] Me?
I'm… I'm just here to help.
Every square inch of this facility needs to be spotless.
translation.it: Ogni centimetro quadrato dovrà essere immacolato.

translation.en: Every surface, I should be able to eat runny eggs off of it.
translation.it: Devo poter mangiare uova crude su ogni superficie.

translation.en: [man screaming] No!
[Nurse Bucket] Unruly patients need to be humanely tamed…
translation.it: I pazienti turbolenti andranno domati umanamente...

translation.en: and tranquil.
And you must all perform your duties
translation.it: E tutti dovrete svolgere i vostri doveri

translation.en: in the utmost professional manner possible.
Do I make myself clear?
-[overlapping chatter] -Absolutely. Thank you so much.
Good. Now let's get to it.
-[people shouting] -[man] Governor!
The new barn will become the heartbeat of Lucia,
translation.it: Il nuovo fienile sarà il fulcro di Lucia.

translation.en: using all the latest advances in assisted therapy
translation.it: Grazie agli ultimi progressi in terapia assistita,

translation.en: to calm even the most troubled mind
before we even begin administering a single medication.
translation.it: prima ancora di somministrare un solo farmaco.

translation.en: That's marvelous. That's wonderful! Do you hear that, guys?
[man] Yes, sir.
-Please, no. -[camera flash clicks]
translation.it: La prego, no. Non voglio essere fotografato.

translation.en: -I do not wish to be photographed. -What about Edmund Tolleson?
translation.it: La prego, no. Non voglio essere fotografato. Ed Edmund Tolleson?

translation.en: What precautions have you taken to ensure your patients' and staff's safety when he arrives?
translation.it: Come tutelerà i pazienti e il personale al suo arrivo?

translation.en: -Where are you gonna chain him up? -All right, come on.
Well, we don't chain anyone up.
He's a human being.
But as for the logistical problems of housing Mr. Tolleson,
translation.it: Ma al problema logistico della sua sistemazione,

translation.en: we found a solution that's both canny and budget-conscious.
translation.it: abbiamo trovato una soluzione accorta e conveniente.

translation.en: As you may know, this facility was formerly a rest spa.
translation.it: Un tempo, questa struttura era un centro termale.

translation.en: It actually has a wine cellar deep underground.
translation.it: Ha una cantina di vini interrata.

translation.en: We've transformed that space into a maximum-security holding area
translation.it: L'abbiamo convertita in un'area di massima sicurezza

translation.en: where Edmund will be housed until he is evaluated.
translation.it: dove Edmund alloggerà fino alla sua valutazione.

translation.en: A wine cellar. Are you kidding me?
Come on now.
Edmund Tolleson is not the story I brought you here to cover.
translation.it: Non siamo qui per parlare di Tolleson.

translation.en: It certainly isn't the one you're going to run!
[Nurse Bucket] Dr. Hanover!
It's Father Murphy.
Get me a blanket. We need to make sure he stays warm.
translation.it: Portami una coperta. Dobbiamo tenerlo al caldo.

translation.en: -What's going on? -He collapsed.
What are you doing?
Don't touch him!
Don't you ever lay a hand on me!
translation.it: Non si azzardi più a toccarmi.

translation.en: How dare you!
Just wait for it!
There, there. Keep breathing, keep breathing.
Stay with us, Father.
His blood pressure was dangerously low.
The shock nearly killed him.
Did you say shock?
I think someone gave him the wrong medication.
translation.it: Qualcuno gli ha dato il farmaco sbagliato.

translation.en: [Wilburn] Hey there, Mister. Gov. Wilburn, how about a picture with me?
translation.it: Ciao, caro. Una foto col governatore?

translation.en: -Come on. Let's go. -Look this way, please.
Look into the camera, there you go. Big smile!
What's wrong with him?
They just told him that his brother passed away, poor thing.
translation.it: Gli hanno appena detto che suo fratello è morto, poverino.

translation.en: Not that it would have mattered.
He didn't know, but he wasn't getting furloughed anyway.
translation.it: Lui non lo sa, ma non gli avrebbero mai dato il congedo.

translation.en: His nephew called, said they didn't want him let out.
translation.it: Ha chiamato il nipote. Non vogliono che esca da qui.

translation.en: [Wilburn] Look here.
[man] Look up and smile.
Miss Ratched, would you come with me, please?
translation.it: Sig.na Ratched, può venire con me?

translation.en: Doctor. The governor would like a word--
How is the patient? Did he pull through?
translation.it: Si è ripreso il paziente? Tutto ok?

translation.en: Y-- yes.
Fantastic. Look, I told the reporters and the photographers to go upstairs.
translation.it: Fantastico. Ho detto ai giornalisti di fotografarci di sopra.

translation.en: You'll be on one side of the bed,
translation.it: Lei da una parte del letto e io dall'altra,

translation.en: I'll be on the other, handing you the check for $75,000.
translation.it: Lei da una parte del letto e io dall'altra, mentre le do l'assegno da 75.000 dollari.

translation.en: -The patient will be in the middle. -Wha--
I don't understand.
Doctor, a dozen reporters just saw a member of your staff save a man's life.
translation.it: - Non capisco. - Dottore, i giornalisti hanno visto una sua infermiera salvare un uomo.

translation.en: Let's not discourage them from putting that in the story,
and let's make sure they have a photo to go with that story.
translation.it: Serve una foto da abbinare all'articolo.

translation.en: I told you, I don't do photographs.
translation.it: Ve l'ho detto, non faccio foto.

translation.en: -We have-- -You're fine.
She's the one that saved his life. I choose her.
translation.it: È stata lei a salvarlo. Scelgo lei.

translation.en: All right, gentlemen, one more shot and we're done.
translation.it: Un ultimo scatto e abbiamo finito.

translation.en: Great. Let's get one with the two of us. Huh?
Please don't put your hand on me like that.
translation.it: La prego, non mi tocchi così.

translation.en: Thank you.
Well, I guess she works here now.
[Mildred] Hello, Mr. Salvatore.
I'm sorry about your brother.
I know how you feel right now,
not being able to be with him.
translation.it: a non poter stare con lui.

translation.en: Told that you're mad…
when that's what's driving you mad.
translation.it: quando è questo a farti impazzire.

translation.en: Isn't it?
I know how that feels.
I had a brother.
He was the only family I ever had.
Well, the only family I ever knew, anyway.
translation.it: Tutta la famiglia che conoscessi, quanto meno.

translation.en: I remember my mother and father, but I can't picture them.
translation.it: Ricordo mia madre e mio padre, ma non riesco a visualizzarli.

translation.en: All I remember is a…
a feeling.
You see, I was taken away from them when I was very young…
translation.it: Mi portarono via da loro quando ero molto piccola.

translation.en: and told that someday I would see them again.
translation.it: Mi dissero che un giorno li avrei rivisti.

translation.en: That they would come for me.
But that was a lie.
They never did.
And so all I had was my brother.
And then he was taken away from me too.
translation.it: Ma mi portarono via anche lui.

translation.en: And he needed me.
He really needed me…
and I was helpless.
There was nothing I could do to protect him anymore.
translation.it: Non potevo fare più nulla per proteggerlo.

translation.en: Right now, there's something difficult I have to tell you.
translation.it: Ora devo dirti una cosa difficile.

translation.en: The doctors and nurses here, they want to give you hope…
translation.it: I dottori e le infermiere qui vogliono darti la speranza...

translation.en: that one day you can leave here and see your family again.
translation.it: che un giorno potrai uscire e rivedere la tua famiglia.

translation.en: But you deserve someone to show you mercy, Mr. Salvatore,
translation.it: Ma meriti che qualcuno ti mostri compassione, sig. Salvatore.

translation.en: and so I have to tell you
that I know for a fact that they are never going to let that happen.
translation.it: che so per certo che non lo permetteranno mai.

translation.en: You are going to spend the rest of your life in here…
translation.it: Passerai il resto della tua vita qui...

translation.en: because your family doesn't ever want to see you again.
translation.it: perché la tua famiglia non vuole più vederti.

translation.en: [in wavering voice] It's something I wish someone had told me when I was young…
so I could stop believing otherwise.
translation.it: per smettere di credere il contrario.

translation.en: [softly] How different I would be if someone had.
translation.it: Sarei diversa, se qualcuno me l'avesse detto.

translation.en: But I have to tell you,
you have been subjected to enough pain.
translation.it: che hai già provato troppo dolore.

translation.en: You deserve to be free from it.
I am only gonna tell you this once…
translation.it: Te lo dirò una volta sola.

translation.en: but there is a letter opener on Dr. Hanover's desk.
translation.it: C'è un tagliacarte sulla scrivania del dott. Hanover.

translation.en: I can take you there right now.
Would you like that?
Fellow Californians.
Hello, Jerry.
Glad you could make it.
Miss Ratched.
Do you take me for an idiot?
translation.it: Mi ha preso per un idiota?

translation.en: Nurse Bucket informed me that Father Murphy suffered cardiogenic shock.
translation.it: Bucket mi ha detto che padre Murphy ha avuto uno shock cardiogeno.

translation.en: That's right.
Strange that the seal is freshly broken,
translation.it: Strano che il sigillo sia rotto di fresco.

translation.en: considering none of our patients are on this medication.
translation.it: Nessun paziente qui assume questo farmaco.

translation.en: Of course it would be dangerous for somebody with Father Murphy's condition to take these.
translation.it: Sarebbe pericoloso somministrarlo a qualcuno come padre Murphy.

translation.en: Wouldn't you say?
Yes.
I honestly don't know what you're asking me, Doctor.
translation.it: Non capisco dove voglia andare a parare.

translation.en: Is there somebody in my office?
Dr. Hanover, are you feeling all right?
[breathing fast] Oh, God.
I don't…
How'd he get in here?
Clearly, he wasn't being supervised closely enough.
God damn that Bucket!
-Dr. Hanover. -What am I going to do?
The press is here.
Dr. Hanover.
You are in a state of shock right now.
What has happened here is a tragedy, yes.
All my work. Everything, everything I'm fighting for…
translation.it: Eccome. Tutto ciò per cui lotto...

translation.en: I'll be exposed.
-This-- this negligence will ruin me! -Dr. Hanover.
-Will ruin me! -Dr. Hanover, you must stop!
I will take care of this.
You stand up tall and proud, you walk out of this room,
translation.it: Ora esca da questa stanza a testa alta

translation.en: face the governor, and you be quick about it. He's waiting.
translation.it: e vada dal governatore. Presto, la aspetta.

translation.en: Yes.
Thank you. Thank you.
And Dr. Hanover.
When you have a moment with the governor after his speech,
you tell him you've offered me a position here.
translation.it: gli dica che mi ha offerto un posto.

translation.en: He will be pleased.
Yes. Yes, of course.
He'll be pleased.
[Wilburn] I am a child of California.
translation.it: Io sono un figlio della California.

translation.en: I'm proud to count myself amongst her native sons.
translation.it: Con orgoglio, mi annovero tra i suoi cittadini natii.

translation.en: I was raised on the promise of this great state.
translation.it: Mi ha cresciuto con la sua grande promessa.

translation.en: [Nurse Bucket] What exactly are you doing in there?
Hello, Nurse Bucket.
Dr. Hanover asked me to wash the towels in his private bathroom.
translation.it: Il dottore mi ha chiesto di lavargli gli asciugamani.

translation.en: He asked you to wash his towels together with the linen from the patients' rooms?
translation.it: Ti ha chiesto di lavarli insieme alle lenzuola dei pazienti?

translation.en: Maybe you haven't been listening to his lectures,
translation.it: Forse non ascolta i suoi discorsi.

translation.en: but Dr. Hanover believes all human beings are equal.
translation.it: Per il dottore, tutti gli esseri umani sono uguali.

translation.en: [Wilburn] I believe in the dreams of California,
dreams shared by every restless soul
translation.it: Credo nei sogni della California, sogni condivisi da ogni anima pioniera

translation.en: who pulled up stakes and journeyed west to discover this land.
translation.it: che si è avventurata a ovest per scoprire questa terra.

translation.en: A place where our tomorrows are better than our yesterdays,
translation.it: Un luogo dove il domani è migliore di ieri

translation.en: and where we do not shrink from the responsibility that is our fellow man!
translation.it: e dove non ci sottraiamo all'onere di aiutare il prossimo.

translation.en: I promise you…
that we shall win together!
Hanover, it's been a pleasure.
Exceeded expectations.
Thank you, sir. We'll be in touch.
Yes.
And that nurse…
Tell her I said goodbye.
There's not a lot of meat on her bones, but what's there is choice.
translation.it: È tutta pelle e ossa, ma ha ogni cosa al posto giusto.

translation.en: [man] Let's go!
[man] Edmund Tolleson, you're to be held at Lucia State Mental Hospital
translation.it: Edmund Tolleson, sarà internato nella Clinica di Lucia

translation.en: for a period of 120 days,
or until Dr. Richard Hanover can make the accurate recommendation regarding your fitness to stand trial.
translation.it: o finché il dott. Hanover non la riterrà idoneo ad affrontare il processo.

translation.en: During this time, you are still a prisoner of the state of California,
translation.it: Resterà un detenuto dello Stato della California

translation.en: and will be treated as such.
Is that you?
It's me. [gasps]
I found you.
I finally found you.
I don't wanna die.
You're not going to die, Edmund.
I promise.
